entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 6.0 and 7.0 failing to decompress zlib stream that is decompressible by .NET Framework 4.7.2 #94246
  • [NativeAOT] Consider moving `Monitor.DebugBlockingScope` to be under `Lock` #94242
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] `Wasm.Build.Tests.Blazor.SimpleRunTests.BlazorBuildRunTest` failing on Windows #94240
  • [WASM] DotnetHostBuilder withDebugging does not accept a value of 0 #94238
  • [Android] WebRequest causes SSL exception on Android API <= 23 on .NET 8 #94230
  • NativeAOT tests crashing with infinite recursion in Lock #94227
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] AOT: `System.Globalization.Calendars.Hybrid.WASM.Tests` getting terminated #94225
  • gcstress0x3 hangs for osx arm64 Checked #94224
    9.0.0
  • [SslStress] SocketException (111): Connection refused #94222
    9.0.0
  • Signed division performed even when values are provably non-negative #94218
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement missing functionalities #94216
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement missing functionalities #94215
  • [browser][hybridGlobalization] Hybrid Globalization fails with AOT #94212
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 11 Regressions on 10/25/2023 1:04:28 PM #94228
  • Assembly.GetCallingAssembly() needs IL2026-like warning for Native AOT (and self contained) builds #94200
  • Dns.GetHostEntry returns hostnames which aren't valid DNS hostnames #94195

Closed

  • Timezone Tests Fail with TestReadyToRun on Linux in CI #94190
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] System.NotImplementedException: CORINFO_HELP_GETSYNCFROMCLASSHANDLE #77093
    9.0.0
  • [Test Failure] Http2_IncorrectServerPreface_RequestFailsWithAppropriateHttpProtocolException #92647
    9.0.0
  • gRPC client failed to establish TLS connection to grpc service #92788
  • Performance Issue with `IsWindowsService` due to Repeated Process Lookups #93613
    9.0.0
  • Metric description for `http.client.request.duration` does not match the spec #93945
    9.0.0
  • Only some enum values are interpreted as bytes, and not string, in custom JsonConverter. #94206
  • [API Proposal]: Convert.TryFromHexString #78472
    9.0.0
  • [browser][perf] Blazor startup regression 2023-04-21 #89631
    8.0.0
  • SA1136: Enum values should be on separate lines #94098
  • There is a difference in the Regex judgment results. #94156

PullRequests

Created

  • we need to skip the SIP region in the last step of handling the alloc region #94249
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add some sanity checking for SPMI JIT options arguments #94248
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: morph blocks in RPO #94247
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Aia Limit #94244
    area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Socket Tests Disable #94243
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Fix class construction recursion issue in `Lock` on NativeAOT #94241
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Build Mac symbols in .dSYM bundle, not single .dwarf file #94237
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [ILLink analyzer] Move dynamic object logic into dataflow analysis #94236
    area-Meta, linkable-framework
  • tests\Loader - use 3 stripes for gcstress #94235
    area-Infrastructure
  • Do some cleanup on TimeSpan to ensure better inlining and clearer semantics #94226
    area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Swap loadvector* and loadvectorandunzip* #94220
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Add more gcdump and gcinfo code. #94219
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] enable timer tests #94217
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] enable MT PLINQ #94214
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Additional QuicConnectionOptions #94211
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Tests build fix with BuildAsStandalone #94208
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] unify pthread pool size to 32 #94204
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Changes related to type casting errors, as well as cosmetic fixes #94198
    NO-MERGE, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #94193
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Enable SA1136: Enum values should be on separate lines #94098 #94100
    area-Meta
  • Fix compilation of Synchronized method combined with generics #94203
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 118.0.5993.117, windows: 119.0.6045.59 #94144
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Annotate projects that aren't XML source of truth #94234
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • make Http2_RequestFailsWithAppropriateHttpProtocolException test more deterministic #94112
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] do not contain `LEA` if offset < 0` #93992
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.15
  • JIT: make global morph its own phase #94185
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • hosting windows service helper enhancement #93771
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [browser] Disable AOT Hybrid Globalization wbt #94221
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, disabled-test
  • [NativeAOT] Reflection type refactoring #93440
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable failing outerloop tests for native AOT #94213
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update `http.client.request.duration` metric description #94061
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Change Not IsWindows condition to IsLinux on Socket test disable #94163
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Convert.Try{From/To}HexString #86556
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [PERF] Improve branch on condition code for s390x #94201
    area-VM-meta-mono, arch-s390x, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] use portable timer #94180
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] Disabling tests failing in the last two weeks on MT. #94051
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-threading-mono
  • ARM64: Fix Vector64x2/3/4 API comments. Minor cleanup in AdvSimd. #94188
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics

Updated

  • Make ValueTuple members that can be made readonly readonly #90773
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [Draft] Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps #93906
    NO-MERGE, needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Interpreter automatic PGO #92981
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Report StackOverflowException on NativeAOT on Linux #93901
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Tar: Only treat reparse points marked as junctions or symlinks as actual tar symlinks #89102
    needs-author-action, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Add support for ISpanFormattable in StringBuilder.Append(Object) #92197
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Implement StoreSelectedScalar for Arm64 #93223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Simplify surrogate handling logic in WebUtlity #93515
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Add an additional length check to FrozenDictionary and FrozenSet #92546
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Improve System.DirectoryServices interop guidelines conformance #93722
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Improve and unify debug views of dictionaries. #92534
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Improve the help message in build.ps1 #92192
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Lock that uses congestion detection for self-tuning #93879
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • BigInteger constructor perf #91176
    area-System.Numerics, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Optimize cancellation handling in Hosting #93949
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Implements new `int`and `long` overloads for `TimeSpan` #94143
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Use `StoreAligned` not `Store` in WidenAsciiToUtf16 #89892
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] deputy testing #93920
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Having space in path fails builds #92399
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [draft][browser] Run unit tests on multithreaded runtime with multithreaded xunit runner #91317
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, test-enhancement, os-browser
  • [iOS][non-icu] Implement missing Locale and Casing functions #94038
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [browser] logging and exit improvements #93472
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Arm64: Update certain encodings of instructions to make them size agnostic #94104
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Complex Rune enumeration over spans of UTF-16 and UTF-8 text #87927
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [wasm] Fix AOT publish in paths with space on Windows #94166
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [Mono] Enable IL strip for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V] Floating NaN overflow test fix #94168
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] enable threading API features #94167
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Implement StoreVectorNxM for Arm64 #94129
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [mono] Test upgrading to ICU 72.3 #93756
    needs-area-label
  • Enumerable.ToArray performance improvement using InlineArray #90459
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Update SystemdHelpers.cs #94191
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • StringBuilder.Replace with ReadOnlySpan<char> #93938
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT][mono][aot] Implementation of nollvm init method #89074
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-AOT-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reenable CanRunDsicoveryTool test after rc2 runtime codeflow from templating #36587
  • Make Desktop WPF use Core WPF targets and tasks (MarkupCompile) #36585
  • Ensure that RestoreActionConfig is flowed through workload installation #36583

Closed

  • .NET local tool install not working with .NET 8 RC2 SDK #36539
  • Make ImplicitUsings does not work out of the box with .NET Framework project #24909
    9.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36584
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch back to the RC2 build since GA has gone internal. #36578
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Silence workload install logging on `dotnet --info` and related commands. #36443
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • update .idea/ since it's a folder #36364
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create project templates target to 9.0 #34996
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Bump Verify.DiffPlex from 2.2.1 to 2.3.0 in /eng/dependabot #36547
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

Updated

  • upgrade stage 0 and unwind a few steps that were done for the 9.0 upg… #36437
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2305494 #36497
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Workload history #34946
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 8.0.2xx
  • Skip workload integrity check on Linux and non-sudo #36123
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, DO NOT MERGE
  • Update manpages for 8.0 #36447
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 8.0.1
  • Add dotnet package search #36289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect nullable analysis of compound assignment due to double visit of operands #70646
    17.9
  • Wrong Line numbers are giving in case of / #70636

Closed

  • Collection literals not emitted correctly in Roslyn #70375
    17.9
  • Compiler crashes on unreachable code in exception filter with pattern matching in Release configuration only #70200
    17.9
  • Exception in `RefSafetyAnalysis` with nested collection initializer of `ref struct` type #70638
  • Missing CS0169 for ref fields without ref-assignments #69736
    17.9
  • Code Cleanup too aggressive with formatting of dotnet_diagnostic.CS0219 #70187
    17.9
  • '/warnaserror-:DiagnosticId' should not nullify diagnostic severity settings for 'DiagnosticId' in globalconfig #70570
    17.10
  • Assertion failure in semantic model on `foreach` with custom enumerator of pointer type #70340
    17.9
  • Make sure that CallerFilePath returns the correct filename, even in case of partial classes, split over different files #70619
    17.9
  • Label indentation wrong when immediately following if/for without brackets in dotnet format #70622
    Backlog
  • Likely incorrect `MemberNotNullWhen` application on `AttributeData.HasErrors` #70555
    17.9

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Crash in AbstractChangeImplementationCodeRefactoringProvider #70647
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix fix all exception with duplicate Program declaration in top level program #70645
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix indentation of labels following selection/iteration statements without braces #70641
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Integration fixes #70635
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Address additional restore changes feedback #70633
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Keep unsplit states when analyzing sequence points and sequences #70596
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Skip test, that fails on renamed project template tracked by issue #70627 #70630
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Additional clean up around handling of well known attributes #70632
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: handle missing cases for ref struct collections in HasLocalScope #70642
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove Tiered Compilation opt-out from AnalyzerRunner #70612
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Expose AnalysisContext.MinimumReportedSeverity #70131
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure bulk included diagnostic IDs for Code cleanup only fix Warning/Error diagnostics #70353
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure '/warnaserror-:DiagnosticId' does not nullify globalconfig severity setting #70572
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Perform decoding of AttributeUsageAttribute for PE types in PEModule. #70605
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9 P1
  • Adjust incorrect MemberNotNullWhen attribute #70557
    Area-Compilers, 17.9 P1
  • Merge `main` to `release/dev17.9` for 17.9P1 snap #70644
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix assert in semantic model of foreach over pointer #70640
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Snap 17.9P1 #70637
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Switch MSBuildWorkspace to running builds out of proc #70469
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve Hover markdown on 'await' keyword #70629
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Compiler support for respecting custom configured analyzer severity settings #69843
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid loading attributes for PE symbols for the purpose of getting AsyncMethodBuilderAttribute information. #70625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add nested code actions to csharp extension #70475
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Unnecessary directives #70251
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [Prototype] Show project-wide first party 'Code analysis suggestions' in lightbulb menu #70621
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NavigationException doesn't have a useful message. #51787
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla #51786
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #51785
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #51784
  • Perf regression: endpoint #51783
  • Hot Reload with dotnet-watch and Blazor WebAssembly fails with "No hot reload changes to apply." in .NET 7 and "not supported by the runtime" in .NET 8 RC2. #51781
  • [Mock Authentication] Integration tests in ASP.NET Core #51776
  • [Blazor] Replace `webapp,razor` with `blazor` on `dotnet new` #51774
    8.0.x
  • We cannot use services registered in Web assembly in components that are Interactive Server rendered. #51773
  • Splitting dotnet.wasm when publishing #51772
  • Quarantine ConnectionClosedWithoutActiveRequestsOrGoAwayFIN #51770
  • Action route starting with `:` is interpreted as `/:` #51769
  • Different scoped services lifetime in Blazor Web App with Server render mode #51768
    Discussions
  • Kestrel options do not apply. #51763
    Discussions
  • Web Farm with IIS10 Servers | Content Server: HTTP Error 500.0 - ASP.NET Core IIS hosting failure (in-process) #51764

Closed

  • Support MAX_CONNECTION_AGE in dotnet server implementation #51778
  • System.Web adapter API to convert between ASP.NET Core and System.Web types #51119
  • source-building: restore.cmd not working properly (Microsoft.DotNet.Arcade.Sdk not found) #50950
  • Blazor web app template created on dotnet 8.0 using VS2022 Preview has build issues #51738
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #50321
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapivanilla #50324
  • Published size regression: basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #50323
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #50322
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #50241
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #50240
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #50239
  • Perf improvement: caching, fortunes, fortunes_ef #50340
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef #50341
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #50342
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudListProducts #50359
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, fortunes_dapper, json #50971
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #51383
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, updates, updates #51457
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, single_query, updates #51486
  • Build time regression for MVC templates #50923
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo #51475
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #51474
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #51473
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #51472
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #51471
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #51470
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #51712
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot #51684
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapipublishaot #51683
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #51682
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #51681
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #51658
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #51657
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #51656
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #51655
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapipublishaot #51654
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #51653
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #51652
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext, plaintext #51716
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext, plaintext #51717
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, json #51719
  • Perf improvement: caching, plaintext, updates #51721
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes, fortunes_dapper #51722
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries, single_query, updates #51723
  • Perf improvement: json, plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextSansFilter #51729
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #51765
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla #51767
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #51766
  • GetEndpoint is always null and RouteValues is always empty in custom exception handler #51755
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, endpoint, mvc #51718

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update SDK version #51761
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Quarantine connection closed test #51771
    tell-mode, area-networking, 8.0.0
  • Remove selenium-standalone; update Selenium.WebDriver #51775
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Show user friendly error when network requests fail #51690
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Show user friendly message for streaming rendering failures #51687
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Rename Microsoft.Aspnetcore.Testing to Microsoft.AspNetCore.TestUtils #51713
    area-infrastructure
  • doc(DenyAnonymousAuthorizationRequirement): Actual behaviour is different than class name #51490
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-security
  • Update HubConnection.ts to provide a easier to read order of SignalR params #51559
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • ApiConventionAnalyzer: support switch expressions #51359
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet-counters collect all counters #4378
  • dotnet-dump not working when process run as user #4375

PullRequests

Created

  • Add dotnet-counters console exporter tests #4376

Merged

  • Allow ` in hex strings #4379
    bug, auto-merge, sos
  • [RISC-V] Add partial SOS 'clrstack' command implementation. #4356

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Border with StrokeShape RoundRectangle does not apply rounding to all corners #18453
  • Setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView on Windows throws NullReferenceException #18452
  • VerticalStackLayout with WidthRequest does not render correctly on iOS and MacCatalyst #18450
  • Label FontFamily is not recognized when setting WindowsPackageType to none and WindowsAppSDKSelfContained to true #18447
  • [net8-rc2] Slow `ModalPage` rendering if a `CollectionView` or `ListView` is used #18445
  • [MAUI][.NET7] After uppercase is enabled, characters are entered in an incorrect sequence on D4 Page #18444
  • SelectionLength Property Not Applied to Entry at Runtime #18443
  • [Windows]Repeated navigation page crash #18441

Closed

  • [regression/7.0.0] Label measuring seems to break the parent layout width #18160
    Backlog
  • Cannot use SwapChainPanel in MAUI - gives error and breaks app. Any workaround or solution? (Windows) #18446
  • Maui iOS crashes on launch in release mode #18438

PullRequests

Created

  • (Windows) Fix backbutton not being drawn for other NavigationPages #18451
    platform/windows 🪟, area/navigation 🧭, i/regression, .NET 8 SR1
  • [ios] update MemoryAnalyzers and cleanup #18449
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, memory-leak 💦
  • [ci] Bump iOS and Android #18448
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Tizen] Update TizenUIExtensionsVersion #18442
    community ✨

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 8.0.0-preview1.23067.2 to 8.0.0-preview1.23170.2 #18009
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 8 GA
  • [net8.0] Bump xharness for rtm and bring iOS17 tests #18353
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Merge net8.0 into main #18380
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, stale, Under Consideration
  • [controls] fix memory leak with `CarouselView` & `INotifyCollectionChanged` #18267
    area/collectionview 📃, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • set the parents to installer #18086
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨, .NET 8 SR1
  • [C] Lowest specificity for propagated values #17648
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [iOS] Fix ContentPage BackgroundImageSource not working #17789
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Avoid possible crash using essentials Battery #18386
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Does the HierarchyId is supported for InMemoryDatabase? #32199
  • SensitiveDataLogging with ComplexProperty: Unable to cast RuntimeComplexType to type IEntityType #32198
  • CosmosDB with RBAC doesn't work #32197
  • JSON materialization code should be resilient to incorrect JSON documents #32194

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactor out the baselines for CSharpRuntimeModelCodeGeneratorTest #32196
  • Allow to ignore attributes when finding type mapping #32193

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588
  • Remove xliff-tasks source link mapping #17661
  • Install of 8.0.100-rtm.23526.1 failed due to "insufficient privileges" #17645
  • Unwind changes made to temporarily unblock the .net 9 codflow #17453

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable the 9.0 templates #17673
  • Re-enable SB tests #17672
  • Update 8.0 item templates version to official RC2 build #17671

Merged

  • Stop synchronizing xliff-tasks into the VMR #17670

Updated

  • Add coherent dependency for emsdk on runtime and run an coherency update #17600
    Servicing-consider
  • Enable coherency dependency flow for emsdk #17601
    Servicing-consider
  • Disable crossgen and zip file creation in the local dev build unless -pack is used #17478
  • Stop making tools.sh changes during source-build #17664
